statements: DELETE FROM compost_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND action_type = 'add';
DELETE FROM compost_logs WHERE log_id = 5 AND user_id = 10;
DELETE FROM compost_logs WHERE action_type = 'remove' AND log_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM compost_log WHERE id = 1 AND actor_name = 'John Smith'
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE regulatory_entity = 'EPA' AND compliance_status = false
DELETE FROM regulations WHERE body = 'US EPA';
DELETE FROM additives WHERE name = 'Organic Matter';
DELETE FROM additives WHERE description = 'organic' AND additive_id > 10;
